title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including desired features, target audience, performance goals, and any constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the ClimateControlWearable project. This includes hardware components, software modules, communication protocols, data flow, integration points, and addressing the following aspects: 1) Wearable device hardware (sensors, actuators, power source, etc.), 2) Mobile app or companion device for user interface and control, 3) Cloud backend for data processing, storage, and remote management, 4) Communication protocols between components (Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, cellular, etc.), 5) Data security and privacy considerations, 6) Scalability and performance requirements, 7) Fault tolerance and error handling mechanisms, 8) Energy efficiency considerations due to power source constraints. Also, provide a clear delineation of responsibilities for each team member during the implementation phase, with specific tasks and deadlines. This RFC assumes that the project scope and requirements have been defined in a previous RFC (Task: Define Project Scope and Requirements).

title: Develop Hardware Components
description: Design and develop the hardware components, such as sensors, actuators, and microcontrollers, required for the climate control wearable.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Develop the software components, including firmware, mobile apps, and cloud services, required for the climate control wearable.

title: Implement Data Management - Enhanced
description: Design and implement an enhanced data management system for the ClimateControlWearable project. This includes databases, data models, APIs for storing and retrieving user data, device telemetry, and environmental data. The system will prioritize data privacy and security by ensuring compliance with relevant regulations. Additionally, consider implementing a feature for offline data storage and synchronization, data encryption, and an option for users to revoke access to their data. Update the data architecture to be scalable and ready for future features. The design should be reviewed by the Data Architect before implementation. After implementation, the system will undergo security testing prior to deployment.

title: Establish DevOps Pipeline
description: Set up the DevOps pipeline for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment of the software components.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data, device communication, and cloud services from unauthorized access and potential threats.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including technical specifications, user guides, and troubleshooting manuals, for the climate control wearable.
